dmca.title: Casino Vacations claims copyists took its guides
dmca.body:
Gentlemen:

Following is a notice of copyright infringement.
1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.americaneasinoguide.com/colorado.shtml
2.	The pages that infringe our copyrighted work are: http://attractionsmall.com/Colorado/gamblingdv.htm
http://casino-magyck.com/usland-colorado.html
http://colorado-indian-casino.casiglober.info/ http://www.knowyourcasino.com/colorado.php httpJ/www.superonlinecasino.com/casinos_colorado.htm

3.	My name: [private]; [private]@aol.com

4.	Contact information for the infringing web sites is not known to me.

5.I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,
[private]
President
Casino Vacations
Publisher of American Casino Guide
 
December 23, 2005 Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
Via Fax [private]

Gentlemen:

Following is a notice of copyright infringement.

3.	My name: [private]; [private]@aol.com

4.	Contact information for the infringing web sites is not known to me.

5.1 have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,
[private]
President
Casino Vacations
Publisher of American Casino Guide
